snippet.title: Dawn of Defiance - Official Launch Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We were thrilled to announce during IGN Live today that Dawn of Defiance, our open-world, survival-crafting game inspired by ancient Greek mythology, launches into early access Aug. 15, 2024, on Steam and the Epic Games Store. In this all-new trailer, we highlight the game’s incredibly customizable base building systems, as well as the reveal of a threatening new late-game enemy type: the Gorgons!

Dawn of Defiance is available to wishlist now ahead of its debut in early access this August. Follow along with the latest updates on social media @TraegaGames.

For more info: https://www.dawnofdefiance.com
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2059530   
Wishlist on Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/p/dawn-of-defiance-b4f0ca 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/traegagames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TraegaEntertainment
Twitter: https://twitter.com/traegagames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@traegagames
Discord: https://discord.gg/dV6s7CHHZj
